channel.title: We should plug forum mafia on this site!
channel.description:
More or less. If you are on any other sites spread the word so they come here. A) to get more players to come to make sure games get filled. B) larger variety of players _who wants to play with firekitten every time :wink:_ C) get some more skillful players to balance out so we don’t have the kill firekitten / Eevee/ icibalus N1 meta. D) so I can learn and expand my talents by playing with more skillful heads
@eevee @Icibalus _I know you are on other sites this is especially to you this memo_

item.title: We should plug forum mafia on this site!

multisite 99p game

what a shame there isn’t- oh wait

item.title: We should plug forum mafia on this site!
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Okay but that’s a really hard sell in most cases

It would be easier to plug specific games

But they’d need to be unique

But then our home players can’t all participate

So it’s kind of a lose-lose situation

If only there was a multisite 99p game to solve this issue

Read full topic
item.source: We should plug forum mafia on this site!
